== Kanhangad (M + OG) (803256) ==

Kanhangad (M + OG) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 70.47 sq. km. and harbouring 27579 households with total population of 125564 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 23 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 565 km. Male population is 58564 and female population is 67000. Scheduled Caste population is 3958 and Scheduled Tribes population is 896. Census Location Code of the town is 803256<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class I (population_total > 1,00,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 0 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 158 km. Railway station is at Kanhangad at a distance of 0 km.
